effect.short: Has double power if a friendly Pokémon fainted last turn.
effect.full: Inflicts regular damage.  If a friendly Pokémon fainted on the previous turn, this move has double power.

flavorTexts.text:
The user gets revenge for a fainted ally. If an ally
fainted in the previous turn, this move’s power
is increased.
